segments.text: I'd like to have this shirt washed and ironed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , do you want us to use starch ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , heavy starch in the collar please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , sir . Your shirt will be ready by Thursday morning . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also have a suit to be dry-cleaned . Can I fetch it the day after tomorrow ? It's urgent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you please tell me when your laundry opens and closes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll remain open from 9 a . m . till 8 p . m .
segments.speaker: S2
